comments:
Build ID: M20070202-1523

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Setup RAC on OS 400
2. Specify the host for the location file to point to the OS400 machine.
3. Run the test suite.

Results: The deployment is successful, but all the testcases fail as the out files are not generated.

I contemplated that this could be a problem with the setup. But the org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.tests\junit\AllTests.testsuite runs without any problems. 

Also i gather that the GLA standalone test on OS 400 passed and this seems more like a problem with the test case
